'''Minecraft: Combat Handbook''' is a guide to [[Minecraft]] combat first published in 2014<ref>https://www.amazon.com/Minecraft-Combat-Handbook-Official-Mojang/dp/0545685168</ref>, and an updated version was published in 2015<ref>https://www.amazon.com/Minecraft-Combat-Handbook-Updated-Official/dp/0545823234</ref>. Therein the handbook are several tips from ''Minecraft'' [[Youtuber]]s of the time including [[Paul Soares Jr.]], [[FyreUK]], and [[CNB MInecraft]]. <!-- Writer's Note: I have the Update Edition so I will be writing with that, if any of you have the original book please feel free to add on! :) -->

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|'''In Minecraft, you're never alone and the threat of attack is constant. How can you survive?'''<br><br>The official Combat Handbook will teach you everything you need to know to defend yourself from hostile monsters and enemy players.<br><br>Learn how to build a fort, craft armor and weapons, set mob traps, defeat enemies in one-on-one combat, and battle your way out of the Nether and the End. With tips from many Minecraft experts, as well as the team behind the game Mojang, you'll be a formidable Minecraft warrior in no time! |Original & Updated description}}
